item.description:
You'll find us at picnic locations #95 & #96. There are three picnic table and two fire pits for charcoal grilling. We'll also have a gas grill available. These sites are near a gazebo "G" off a dirt road which is off a paved road near the restrooms located across from a sign which states "Picnic areas #40-53." Look for a blue Ford Focus.

 

 

We are planning to join other Meetup groups for a fun/wacky day of Dodgeball.

 

Sunday June 3, 2012 - 1:30 - Goddard State Park - East Greenwich, Rhode Island

 

Potluck and BBQ Grills available - Bring something you want to eat and bring something to share.

  

The more the merrier - bring friends.

 

Check back for updates.
item.how_to_find_us: We are waiting on Goddard Park to send the site location and I will post it when it comes ASAP. Thanks, Lonnie
item.name: Dodge Ball with BBQ or Picnic
